channel.title: How to play Black Mesa in Window Mode?
channel.description: When I minimize the Black Mesa, I cant go back, so I wanted to know how can I start in window mode.

item.title: How to play Black Mesa in Window Mode?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
yes but depending on your GPU configuration it might run really slowly

in order to play BM in triple screen eyefinity is recommended

item.title: How to play Black Mesa in Window Mode?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
hufelande:

I try steam://rungameid/13540830642081628378 -window
but not working.

I guess itâ€™s now only possible using Steam itself, so you can try the above fix or in Steam Library right click Black Mesa choose properties and you should be able to find the command line button.

Read full topic
item.source: How to play Black Mesa in Window Mode?

item.title: How to play Black Mesa in Window Mode?
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
Options -> Video -> Display mode -> Run in a window -> OK
